name: Amazing Runner In Fantasy Land
description:
Experience the adventure of a cute runner whether elephant, dinosaur, unicorn, cowboy and more. Goal is furthest running!!! Sound like it's easy? but hard to master. No special skills needed,you only attentive mind and fast fingers !

◆◆◆ HOW TO PLAY ◆◆◆
- Tap left or right move runner to other tile and safe from all obstacles .

◆◆◆ GAME FEATURES ◆◆◆
- Beautiful graphic scene and character design
- Multicolored themes
- Smooth game play

◆◆◆ MUSIC ◆◆◆
- John Leonard French ---“ Casual Music Pack Vol. 2 ”
